00001 <?php
00002 /**
00003  * Clase encargada de recoger y guardar mensajes de facebook
00004  * @author Mikel Madariaga
00005  */
00006 class Plugins_Facebook_Cron extends Common_Cron
00007 {
00008     protected $_account;
00009     protected $_client;
00010     protected $_conf;
00011 
00012     function __construct()
00013     {
00014         // Call the Model constructor
00015         parent::__construct();
00016     }
00017 
00018     /**
00019      * Método encargado de establecer conexión con facebook
00020      * @param User_Accounts_Data $account
00021      * @param obj $auth
00022      *
00023      * (non-PHPdoc)
00024      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Cron#connect($idp)
00025      */
00026     public function connect($account)
00027     {
00028         $this->start = microtime();
00029 
00030         $this->_account = $account;
00031         $this->_idUP = $this->_account->getId();
00032         $this->_credentials = unserialize($account->getAuth());
00033 
00034         if ( ! isset($this->_credentials["token"]) )
00035         {
00036             /***
00037              * Esta la primera vez que se conecta a la cuenta del usuario.
00038              * Recoger el token y resto de datos necesarios
00039              */
00040             $this->_ci->config->load('apikeys', TRUE);
00041             $config = $this->_ci->config->item('facebook', 'apikeys');
00042             $this->_config = $config;
00043 
00044             $my_url = site_url('accounts/auth/');
00045             $app_id = $this->_config["appId"];
00046             $app_secret = $this->_config["secret"];
00047             $code = $this->_credentials["code"];
00048 
00049             $url = "https://graph.facebook.com/oauth/access_token?client_id="
00050             .$app_id . "&client_secret="
00051             .$app_secret . "&code=" . $code . "&redirect_uri=" . $my_url;
00052 
00053             $token = file_get_contents($url);
00054             $this->_credentials["token"] = str_replace("access_token=","",$token);
00055 
00056             $accountMapper = User_Accounts_Mapper::get_instance();
00057             $accountMapper->updateFromArray($account->getId(), array("auth" => serialize($this->_credentials)));
00058         }
00059 
00060         if (! $this->_account->getMetadata("id"))
00061         {
00062             /****
00063              * Recoger id de usuario para comprobar que mensajes le pertenecen
00064              */
00065             $url = "https://graph.facebook.com/me?access_token=".$this->_credentials["token"];
00066             $resp = json_decode(file_get_contents($url));
00067 
00068             $account->setMetadata("id", $resp->id);
00069             $account->setMetadata("name", $resp->name);
00070 
00071             $accountMapper = User_Accounts_Mapper::get_instance();
00072             $accountMapper->updateFromArray($account->getId(), array("metadata" => serialize($account->getMetadata() )));
00073         }
00074     }
00075 
00076     /**
00077      * Método encargado de recoger los timelines del usuario y sus amigos
00078      * @return void
00079      *
00080      * (non-PHPdoc)
00081      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Cron#update()
00082      */
00083     public function update()
00084     {
00085         /********* Wall *********/
00086         $url = "https://graph.facebook.com/me/feed?access_token=".$this->_credentials["token"];
00087         $resp = json_decode(file_get_contents($url));
00088 
00089         if (isset($resp->data) and is_array($resp->data)) {
00090 
00091             Plugins_Facebook_DB::save($resp->data, $this->_account,"wall");
00092         }
00093 
00094         /********* home *********/
00095         $url = "https://graph.facebook.com/me/home?access_token=".$this->_credentials["token"];
00096         $resp = json_decode(file_get_contents($url));
00097 
00098         if (isset($resp->data) and is_array($resp->data)) {
00099 
00100             Plugins_Facebook_DB::save($resp->data, $this->_account, "home");
00101         }
00102 
00103         if ($this->debugMode === true) {
00104             echo "\r\n Facebook cron elapset time : ".$this->elapsedTime()."s\r\n";
00105         }
00106 
00107         $accountMapper = User_Accounts_Mapper::get_instance();
00108         $this->_account->setLastUpdate(time());
00109 
00110         $data = array(
00111             "lastUpdate" => $this->_account->getLastUpdate()
00112         );
00113 
00114         $accountMapper->updateFromArray($this->_account->getId(), $data);
00115     }
00116 }
